contexts.context: "Outnumbered and isolated, I <mark>yielded</mark> to my foe. The creature dressed like a...
...Dagoth Ur beneath Red Mountain when he would not <mark>yield</mark> to their will.

Faith conquers all. Let us <mark>yield</mark> to Faith.
